attributes.action: Retract mandatory vaccine stamp for entry into all events, allow negative test
attributes.background:
Forcing people into having a vaccine they may not be comfortable with to be able to enter any venues or gatherings is against our basic human rights, mandatory vaccine passports would create the illusion of freedom.
A negative test should also be accepted for entry in any circumstances and is fair.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671
